import React from 'react'; import { $ } from 'react-jquery-plugin' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.carousel.css'; import 'owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.theme.default.css'; export const JobListing = () => { $(document).ready(function() { $('#client-logos').owlCarousel({ loop:true, margin:15, nav:true, responsive:{0:{items:1},600:{items:4},1000:{items:6} }, navText: ["",""] }); }); return ( <>

With so many options, job seekers need help finding the best opportunities for them. Weâ€™re looking for a passionate and self-driven UX Designer who can share our passion for helping people get jobs.

) } export default JobListing
